In England, in the seven days to 02 June, there were 22,827 new confirmed cases (40.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 May, there were 15,401 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 48% (7,426 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 June is 3,944,955 (7,008.6 cases per 100,000 population).
